Question: How can I create a new project?
Answer: Go to your editor's top menu and click "Project/Create new project"

Question: How can I open a project?
Answer: Go to your editor's top menu and click "Open project". Search your project's name.

Question: How can I rename a project?
Answer: Open the project and click in "Project/Rename". type its new name.

Question: How can I share a project with other Quadrigram users?
Answer: Go to the "Project" menu and click on "Share". Write the email/s (comma separated in case there is multiple receivers) and lick on "OK".
Tarea: Compartir un proyecto con otro usuario

Question: How can I preview my project?
Answer: Click to top right menu called "Preview"

Question: How can I feed a given visualizer component?
Answer: You need to drag a valid data block into the corresponding slot located in the firast tab of the charts options panel. Specific data structures or layouts depending on each chart.

Question: How can I change the mode to assign colors?
Answer: Go to "Style" section of a given component and click on the arrow beside "colors" to open the colors general settings.
Tarea: Cambiar el modo de asignar colores

Question: How can I assign a list of colors?
Answer: Go to "Style" section of a given component and click on the arrow beside "colors" to open the colors general settings. Select the "Colors" option.

Question: How can I apply colors by categories?
Answer: Go to "Style" section of a given component and click on the arrow beside "colors" to open the colors general settings. Select the "Colors by category" option.
